verses.name: Romans 9:6
verses.text: Not as though the word of God hath taken none effect. For they are not all Israel, which are of Israel:

verses.name: Romans 9:7
verses.text: Neither, because they are the seed of Abraham, are they all children: but, In Isaac shall thy seed be called.

verses.name: Romans 9:8
verses.text: That is, They which are the children of the flesh, these are not the children of God: but the children of the promise are counted for the seed.

verses.name: Romans 9:9
verses.text: For this is the word of promise, At this time will I come, and Sara shall have a son.
